inclusion.criterion: radical intensity-modulated radiation therapy with or without adjunct chemotherapy
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: pregnant or lactating at the time of written consent
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: significant cardiovascular, cerebrovascular and psychiatric illness as judged serious by investigators
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has a history of CAD but is not currently experiencing any significant cardiovascular issues. She does have an abdominal mass and recent diverticulitis, but these do not appear to be exclusionary criteria.
